email_text:
Subject: Urgent Action Required: Verify Your PayPal Account Now

Dear valued PayPal customer,

We are writing to inform you that we have detected suspicious activity on your PayPal account. In order to protect your account and prevent any unauthorized transactions, we require you to verify your account information immediately.

Please click on the link below to verify your account:
[Phishing link]

Failure to verify your account within the next 24 hours may result in temporary suspension of your account. We take the security of our customers very seriously and want to ensure that your account remains safe and secure.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

Sincerely,
PayPal Security Team
